content.query:
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk 'latest-all.json',
        data_source = 'wd',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
     cross apply openjson((CASE WHEN doc='[' OR doc=']' THEN NULL ELSE doc END))
        with("id" varchar(100), "type" varchar(50))
where "type"='item'
